google_bigtable_instance_iam.description: Collection of resources to manage IAM policy for a Bigtable instance.

instance.description: The name or relative resource id of the instance to manage IAM policies for.

member/members.description: Identities that will be granted the privilege in `role`.

role.description: The role that should be applied. Only one

policy_data.description: The policy data generated by a `google_iam_policy` data source.

project.description: The project in which the instance belongs. If it

etag.description: (Computed) The etag of the instances's IAM policy.
